author: Jazz Monroe and Noah Yoo
title: John Carpenter Announces New Halloween Director, “Might Even Do the Music”
text:
John Carpenter Announces New Halloween Director, “Might Even Do the Music” “Maybe. It could be kind of cool.” John Carpenter Photo by Xavi Torrent/WireImage 
Last year, composer and director John Carpenter announced his return to the Halloween franchise as executive producer for the next film. Now, he’s unveiled the creative team: David Gordon Green ( Pineapple Express ) will direct, and Danny McBride ( Eastbound & Down, This Is the End ) will co-write the script with him, IGN reports . “I might even do the music,” Carpenter wrote on Facebook. “Maybe. It could be kind of cool.” See his post beow. 
Carpenter scored the original Halloween , and recently re-recorded its iconic theme , along with his scores for Escape from New York and other films.
